## Suggested readings and resources

1. Rstudio cheat sheets: https://rstudio.com/resources/cheatsheets/  
  Features cheat sheets on Rstudio software and many useful packages

2. R for data science: https://r4ds.had.co.nz/  
  Free online book. Efficient instruction in data science skills for R

3. Michelle Harris's videos and tutorials on installing R and Rstudio
